title: Is it true that when you stop worrying, things get better by themselves? - Quora

response.answer_text: Absolutely. More worry doesn't mean more results. Its actually the reverse. You must know that there is a problem. FULL STOP. How to deal with it should be going on, but lingering to many options is not a good exercise. First face the problem, take some time to think over it, come to a solution fast and do away with it. If its something that you cannot do much about , then try forgetting about it, it shall help in this manner.

Things get better by doing action ,reaction to a particular problem or in persisting moment.Worrying means adding more stress to the brain, it would not be able to sort out the problem.Instead of looking for solutions worrying leads to state of depression where you got stuck. We cannot stop worrying thats true, but have a control over it by reacting not by just thinking .
